name: The Scenic Route (Miguel Morgado)
description:
Adventure outdoors take picture of all the amazing scenes and animals that you collect for your album. This is a game jam I made in one week for the VimJam and 8bitstoinfiinty jam. Check out my twitch stream I did for game development. I might make a future video of my process. https://www.twitch.tv/migcreatesgames

Press Enter on the keyboard of the mouse option gets stuck
